lst.name: sentence
lst.str: World rice consumption is projected to reach record levels in 1986/87, the report said, as higher per capita incomes, increased domestic production and low import prices have allowed people in many countries to substitute rice for coarse grains.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Domestic prices of medium grain relative to long grain have increased, the loan differential has been greatly reduced and increases in long grain yields relative to those of other classes have leveled off.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The United States has already recovered a substantial share of the European Community market and made inroads into markets in the Middle East and Africa," the report said.
